title: SW Speedometer (HUD and Wearable)
summary: GPS speedometer with cruise control and journey tracking for Mobile and Wear
description: Enhance your cycling and driving experience with this versatile GPS speedometer with cruise control and journey tracking for Android Wear and Mobile. Cruise control helps you to maintain a steady and safe pace while traveling. Set your target speed and be guided with pulses of vibration to raise your awareness of speed while you’re focused on your surroundings.Designed for your watch while you’re cycling and on your phone in a car as a head-up display. You can customise the speedometer to display miles, kilometres or knots. The gauge is adaptable to a wide array of different vehicles and adjusts its scale according to your speed.SW Velocity is designed to provide better speed awareness for road users. Whether you are driving or cycling, remember to follow the highway code and adjust your speedometer preferences before setting off.* Dial scale from 40 up to 960. * Journey tracking with distance and speed statistics * Measure distance and speed in miles, kilometers and knots* Cruise control provides assistance in maintaining a set cruising speed * Adjustable over-speed warnings* Designed as a HUD for your car dashboard and for Android Wear smart watch
descriptionHTML:
Enhance your cycling and driving experience with this versatile GPS speedometer with cruise control and journey tracking for Android Wear and Mobile. Cruise control helps you to maintain a steady and safe pace while traveling. Set your target speed and be guided with pulses of vibration to raise your awareness of speed while you’re focused on your surroundings.

Designed for your watch while you’re cycling and on your phone in a car as a head-up display. You can customise the speedometer to display miles, kilometres or knots. The gauge is adaptable to a wide array of different vehicles and adjusts its scale according to your speed.

SW Velocity is designed to provide better speed awareness for road users. Whether you are driving or cycling, remember to follow the highway code and adjust your speedometer preferences before setting off.

* Dial scale from 40 up to 960.
* Journey tracking with distance and speed statistics
* Measure distance and speed in miles, kilometers and knots
* Cruise control provides assistance in maintaining a set cruising speed
* Adjustable over-speed warnings
* Designed as a HUD for your car dashboard and for Android Wear smart watch
recentChanges: - Improved Cruise Control and overspeed dial adjustability
